content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Custom data period for one-time reports in Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection August 18, 2024 – Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection provides administrators with the flexibility to select custom time frames, ranging from days to months, for generating data in one-time reports, in addition to the fixed data periods. Email and Collaboration Security → Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Custom data period for one-time reports in Cloud Email and Collaboration Protection
